layout.singingstanza: I love my Mas -- ter, and I will not go out free. For He has died for me, the high -- est price He has paid for me. I love my Mas -- ter, I will serve Him will -- ing -- ly. Re -- main -- ing near, and close to Him this my plea. I love You Mas -- ter, from You I will nev -- er leave. You are my lib -- er -- ty, and my joy com -- plete. I love my Mas -- ter, and I will not go out free. To Him I give my all, my life e -- ter -- nal -- ly!

lyrics.stanza: I love my Master, and I will not go out free. For He has died for me, the highest price He has paid for me. I love my Master, I will serve Him willingly. Remaining near, and close to Him this my plea.
I love You Master, from You I will never leave. You are my liberty, and my joy complete. I love my Master, and I will not go out free. To Him I give my all, my life eternally!
Oh Jesus, Master, to the door post now bring me. Open my ears to hear, Your voice and all that You say to me. Oh Jesus, Master, I will obey willingly. To love and serve Him all my life, this my plea!
